title: ‘Lead by example’: TMC MP Derek O’Brien to Modi, Shah on countering hate speech on social media
text:
Mr Home Minister,



You said all social media accounts spreading hate speech will be stopped. But here is one of the many Qs you did not answer in #Parliament



QUESTION #1



Will PM and you lead by example and stop following accounts that spread bigotry & hate?



WATCH>> pic.twitter.com/pO1K809nmU
meta_description: ‘Stop following all those (Twitter) handles which are spreading bigotry and hate.’
